thread.title: Street Style: Art Comes First Makes a Monochromatic Statement in Tokyo
thread.title_full: Street Style: Art Comes First Makes a Monochromatic Statement in Tokyo

author: Kam Dhillon
title: Street Style: Art Comes First Makes a Monochromatic Statement in Tokyo
text:
Visit the original post to see all 8 images from this gallery. 
Street Style is an ongoing series shot by Highsnobiety. This week we’ve shot Shaka Maidoh & Sam Lambert, the design-duo behind Art Comes First. These two globetrotting tailors prove they’re the new masters of sartorial alchemy, sporting head-to-toe monochrome looks that are expertly minimal yet still pack a punch. 
Subjects: Shaka Maidoh & Sam Lambert / Art Comes First 
Location: Tokyo, Japan
Occupation: Designers
Brands: Art Comes First & Art Comes First x Fred Perry
Curious to know more about the London-based label? Check out Art Comes First x Fred Perry’s debut short film .
